review: Expands viewing possibilities; makes ordinary HD-TV behave like a "smart" TV.  Completely satisfied.
author: Emande

review: I just love it...for $30 Google has given us the capabilities to stream wirelessly....

review: The quality of product is terrible.

review: I's OK.. There are issues with it dropping off the wifi, and there is a lag with the mirroring, but it works properly most of the time. Worth it's low price tag, but this device has NOTHING on the AppleTV.
author: Mark Corbacio
